product_summary: Copyleaks Plagiarism Detector is a powerful tool that helps you detect plagiarism and ensure the originality of your content. With advanced AI technology, it can identify direct plagiarism, paraphrased content, similar text, and AI-generated content. It supports over 100 languages and provides a detailed report with potential plagiarism matches. Copyleaks Plagiarism Detector is trusted by millions of individuals, businesses, and educational institutions worldwide.
product_pros: Provides a detailed report with potential plagiarism matches
Easy to use and integrate with other platforms
product_cons: Can be expensive for some users
May not be able to detect all types of plagiarism
Can be slow to scan large documents
Can be difficult to interpret the results
May not be suitable for all types of content

product_usecases.details: Copyleaks Plagiarism Detector can help students avoid plagiarism in their assignments and ensure the originality of their work.
Copyleaks Plagiarism Detector can help teachers and professors detect plagiarism in student submissions and promote academic integrity.
Copyleaks Plagiarism Detector can help businesses protect their intellectual property and ensure the originality of their content.
Copyleaks Plagiarism Detector can help content creators ensure the originality of their work and avoid copyright infringement.
Copyleaks Plagiarism Detector can help researchers ensure the originality of their work and avoid plagiarism.

product_toolfor.details: Copyleaks Plagiarism Detector is a powerful tool for detecting plagiarism in text documents.
Copyleaks Plagiarism Detector can also detect AI-generated content, which is becoming increasingly common.
Copyleaks Plagiarism Detector supports over 100 languages, making it ideal for detecting plagiarism in documents from different languages.
Copyleaks Plagiarism Detector can also detect plagiarism in source code, which is important for protecting intellectual property.
Copyleaks Plagiarism Detector can help educational institutions promote academic integrity and ensure the originality of student work.

product_pricing: Pricing for Copyleaks Plagiarism Detector starts at $19 per month for the Basic plan. The Premium plan costs $49 per month and the Enterprise plan costs $99 per month. There is also a free plan available with limited features.
